features: Mini Cyclone Stunt Car - Just tuck this portable remote control car into your pocket and play anywhere. 360-Degree rotation on dual-sides, race to drift and flip the RC car all around. This RC stunt car for kids will spin like a crazy cyclone with cool lighting effect.

ABS Rugged Structure - Made of poison-free ABS plastic, the rugged structure of the RC cars for boys age 8-12 is collision resistance, so the harsh condition won’t stop kids’ racing journey! The non-slipping rubber tires also ensure this RC car a stronger grip.

Dual-Motors Higher Performance - The dual-motors RC stunt car is easy to operate in both indoors and outdoors. Small but powerful. The ultra-flexible and swift characteristics ensure for a higher performance racing experience.

Easy for Kids to Operate - The 2.4Ghz non-interference remote control allows multiple remote control car for boys 8-12 to race at the same time. Switch on/off the demo button, the RC cars will do the stunts itself. Besides, the built-in battery frees you from inserting the battery.

Ideal Gift for Kids - This cool remote control car for boys and girls aged at 6 8 9 10 11 12 years old is an ideal birthday gift or any occasion gift for kids. Enjoy the happy family time and sheer control pleasure with BEZGAR (24/7 customer service for you).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: INTERNAL RECHARGEABLE BATTERY Built-in Li-Po battery - It’s convenient for charging at any time, extending your racing time. MINI BUT MIGHTY Small but Powerful - Its small size enables it to be tucked into the pocket and portable to take anywhere. POWERFUL DUAL MOTORS Dual Motors - Motivates the RC cars to race on all terrains easily with flexible operation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, super fast and spinning/reverse action motions are great for the kids! Also easy for them to use. Bought 2, had little problem with one wheel but they replaced it and I sent old one back and transaction was very quick. Am happy with product and seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes. Get it.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for 3 grandsons for Christmas. They love it!Pretty durable with uncoordinated "racers".Their favorite feature is the music that plays through the remote controller. Gotta be honest, it can get a little annoying at times but it can be turned off. And it keeps them busy. Battery life is too be expected just about 30 minutes. But I'd rather 30 minutes of outside time with an RC car than 30 minutes glued to a screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was a huge success
reviews.reviewText: My 5yo old loved it. We wore it out several days in a row. I wish the charge lasted longer, but for the price it's acceptable. The tornado thing it does is a crowd pleaser. It's super fast and rarely got stuck on something. The music made me wish I didn't have ears after a few minutes, but thankfully you can turn that off.This is a perfect gift for any kid, and honestly I think the adults had just as much fun with it. Worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never give a toy that requires batteries without putting batteries in it first and testing it. My husband and I had fun playing with this one! It’s a really cool car. Spinning and lighting up is awesome! Nephew really liked it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The dog loved it!
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas toy and was the hit present this year. Zips around, flips and spins. Our dog was fascinated. I can't imagine what a cat would think. Good, durable value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car was ordered as a replacement for one that was delivered and did not work. However it arrived too late for my grandchildren's visit. It was not good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and mighty
reviews.reviewText: This car is A LOT smaller than I was expecting. I bought it for my nephew for Christmas and ended up getting him a few other things too because the car was so small and I was semi embarrassed to give this as a gift . Well, I didn’t need those other gifts at all! He LOVED this little car. It does a lot of cool things. He’s 9 and he played with it for hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun for kids and adults
reviews.reviewText: Got this during Black Friday. The controller looks and feels very cheap looking, but the car is great and has a lot of zip to it. My son is 22 months and has a blast playing with it. Since he can't control it that well, the demo and spin buttons are an easy way for him to interact with it. The car is also fairly small and just the right size for him to play with.
